programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Avalanche visit the Stars for Game 7 of their West quarterfinal series. Colorado forced a deciding showdown with a 7-4 victory in Game 6 behind Nathan MacKinnon's go-ahead goal in the third period. Dallas coach Peter DeBoer is 8-0 in Game 7s.

programme.title: NHL Hockey St. Louis Blues at Winnipeg Jets
programme.sub-title: St. Louis Blues at Winnipeg Jets
programme.desc: The Jets and Blues play for the second round's last spot in Game 7 of their Western Conference quarterfinal. In Game 6, St. Louis chased Vezina frontrunner Connor Hellebuyck (WPG) for a third time this postseason, evening the series with a 5-2 win.

programme.desc: Former football stars, Emmanuel Acho, LeSean McCoy, James Jones and Chase Daniel, take on sports from all angles.

programme.title: Live: The Herd With Colin Cowherd
programme.desc: A thought-provoking, opinionated, and topic-driven journey through the top sports stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: First Things First
programme.desc: Nick Wright, Chris Broussard and Kevin Wildes explore and energetically advance the biggest stories in sports.

programme.title: Live: Speak
programme.desc: Joy Taylor, Keyshawn Johnson and Paul Pierce dive into the biggest sports topics of the day with insight and experience.

programme.title: Kevin Harvick's Happy Hour
programme.desc: NASCAR legend Kevin Harvick shares his expert opinion on NASCAR news and interviews the biggest names in sports and the racing world.

programme.title: Dirt II: A Season With High Limit
programme.desc: Corey Day rises fast as High Limit hits California. With $25k on the line, Kyle Larson, Rico Abreu, and Brad Sweet face off in a fiery battle at Thunderbowl.

programme.title: IndyCar Racing
programme.sub-title: Children's Of Alabama Indy Grand Prix
programme.desc: The IndyCar Series tunes up for the trip to the bricks with the Children's of Alabama Indy Grand Prix. New Zealand native Scott McLaughlin has been dominant on the Barber Motorsports Park track, winning the last two races held at the Alabama course.

programme.title: PBA Bowling
programme.desc: From Angel of the Winds Casino in Arlington, Wash.

programme.title: TMZ Sports
programme.desc: Gossip and exclusive stories about athletes' personal lives.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: There's €1.5m for the winner of this special anniversary edition of the European Poker Tour. As Day 4 of the Main Event continues, the USA's Rania Nasreddine is put through the wringer and a new generation of poker talent starts to make its mark.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Only 40 players remain in the European Poker Tour Main Event, including reigning champion Simon Wiciak. Can the French pro go back-to-back?

programme.title: United Football League
programme.sub-title: Arlington Renegades at St. Louis Battlehawks
programme.desc: Week 6 in the UFL begins with St. Louis (3-2) facing Arlington (3-2). The Renegades doubled up the Battlehawks 30-15 in Week 4. St. Louis bounced back from that loss by beating Michigan 32-27 in Week 5 behind a three-touchdown effort from Max Duggan.

programme.title: United Football League
programme.sub-title: San Antonio Brahmas at Birmingham Stallions
programme.desc: The Brahmas (1-4) and Stallions (3-2) look to pick up the pieces in this UFL Week 6 finale. Birmingham was stunned 24-20 at home by Memphis in Week 5, while San Antonio fell to Houston 27-3. Tavante Beckett (SA) is second in the UFL with 44 tackles.
